text: Can you turn on my smart light at 7 PM tonight? Today is 2021-12-05.
Sure, I can help with that. What is the ID of your smart light device?
Got it. And just to confirm, you want me to turn on the smart light at 7 PM tonight, correct?
Okay, I've scheduled the smart light to turn on at 7 PM tonight. Is there anything else I can help you with?
